elements.text: never heard of this lang before...:

text: Yeah it’s kinda neat. Rusty lisp.

elements.text: Yeah it’s kinda neat. Rusty lisp.

text: Which is basically the conclusion of my language survey. I want more Rust in my Julia and/or more Julia in my Rust.

elements.text: Which is basically the conclusion of my language survey. I want more Rust in my Julia and/or more Julia in my Rust.

text: Kind of sounds like the holy grail but it looks pretty young still. Not sure why they are targeting game-dev either.

elements.text: Kind of sounds like the holy grail but it looks pretty young still. Not sure why they are targeting game-dev either.

text: I wonder if you could port Julia to Carp? Multidispatch would be a problem, but you could probably do some kind of work around to get 90% of it in 1 go?

elements.text: I wonder if you could port Julia to Carp? Multidispatch would be a problem, but you could probably do some kind of work around to get 90% of it in 1 go?

attachments.title: The Janet Programming Language
attachments.text: Janet is a functional and imperative programming language. It runs on Windows, Linux, macOS, FreeBSD and *nix.
